meanings: to hold (a Buddhist or Shinto ceremony)

lessons.japanese: その島には漁業を営む人たちが住んでいた。
lessons.english: The island was inhabited by a fishing people.

lessons.japanese: この大分類には、金融業又は保険業を営む事業所が分類される。
lessons.english: Into this broad category fall companies that run money lending and insurance businesses.

lessons.japanese: 彼はとどまって父親の商売を営むことにした。
lessons.english: He decided to stay and carry on his father's business.
